name: Warehouse Madness
description:
Manage your storage FAST and don't get HIT by a box to climb on TOP of the scoreboard!

The game is all about managing the haphazardly falling boxes. Your job is to stack the boxes in a way that they don't touch the red line, when they do touch the red line the game is over. When the bottom row is completly filled with boxes the row gets cleared and creates more space for more boxes.
